content: spread the love this valentine s day with a simple quick and charming kindle cover whether it s for you or a loved one you can add your own touch of personalisation by experimenting with different yarn colours or adding a fun embroidered touch for a unique one of a kind kindle cozy the gauge for the main body is 14 stitches by 19 row 10cm x 10cm using aran yarn 4 5mm hook and single_crochet stitches made to fit kindle paperwhite 7th generation i used under a half of cygnet aran skein in the colour blush for the letter and a small amount of dk yarn in dark red for the heart
